bibl.title: Approaches to Artefact Assemblages. Inventories, Imagery, and Stratified Deposits.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Statistical approaches to assemblage comparison. - Study of spatial distribution. - Network analysis: ""object prosopography"". - Case study: network analysis of selected papyrus inventories. - Conclusions. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Field Methods and Post-Excavation Techniques in Late Antique Archaeology

bibl.seg: Joe Williams, Approaches to Artefact Assemblages. Inventories, Imagery, and Stratified Deposits.
Luke Lavan & Michael Mulryan (edd.), Field Methods and Post-Excavation Techniques in Late Antique Archaeology = Late Antique Archaeology. 9 (Leiden, 2012 [2015]) pp. 413-440, 3 tabl., 4 figg.

Introduction. - Statistical approaches to assemblage comparison. - Study of spatial distribution. - Network analysis: ""object prosopography"". - Case study: network analysis of selected papyrus inventories. - Conclusions. - Avec résumé en anglais.
